<answer>To find available hotels in Paris for the specified dates (2024-05-01 to 2024-05-05) within a budget of $210, you would generally use a hotel search tool or website like Booking.com, Expedia, or Hotels.com. These platforms allow users to filter results by location, date range, and price. For personalized assistance or more specific recommendations, consulting with a travel agent specializing in Parisian accommodations could be beneficial.</answer>
